mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE menu_list( mcode, code_name, url, icon_file, up_code, enable, iscategory, icon_color, code_level, js_text) AS ( SELECT m1.mcode, m1.code_name, m1.url, m1.icon_file, m1.up_code, m1.enable, m1.iscategory, m1.icon_color, m1.code_level, m1.js_text FROM menu m1 WHERE up_code IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT m2.mcode, m2.code_name, m2.url, m1.icon_file, m1.up_code, m1.enable, m2.iscategory, m1.icon_color, m1.code_level + 1, m1.js_text FROM menu m1, menu m2 WHERE m1.mcode = m2.up_code ) SELECT * FROM menu_list ORDER BY mcode ASC
SELECT * FROM menu WHERE code_level = 0 AND iscategory = 0 AND "enable" = 1 ORDER BY mcode
